errorMinSigners: Number of owners must be greater than 0.
errorHighSignerThreshold: Threshold must be less than number of owners.
helperSigThreshold: Number of signers needed to approve a proposal.
subTitleSignerAddresses: These users will be able to submit and approve proposals.
labelConnectWallet: To deploy a new Decent Safe
helperNFTWeight: How many votes is this token worth?
helperChooseGovernance: Please select a framework to add governance to your Safe.
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) where voting is enabled after a proposal is created.
helperQuorumERC20: The minimum percentage of total possible token votes required for a proposal's results to be considered official.
helperQuorumERC721: The minimum weight of total available token voting weight required for a proposal's results to be considered official.
governanceDescription: These values can be modified later through a proposal.
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) in which a successful proposal may be executed.
helperTimelockPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) required before a proposal can be executed onchain.
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required by the parent (out of {{totalVotes}}) to freeze this child Safe entirely
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in minutes) for a Freeze Vote's starting and ending point
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in minutes) a successful Freeze Vote will freeze this child Safe
freezeGuardDescription: These configuration values may be changed later on by passing a proposal to do so on this child Safe
helperParentAllocation: The total number of tokens claimable by all parent token holders
helperTokenName: Enter the name of your governance token, i.e. Decent.
helperTokenSupply: The total number of tokens to be created.
descMultisigGov: Best for small groups and/or frequent onchain activity.
descAzoriusErc20Gov: Best for distributing power through liquid fungible tokens.
descAzoriusErc20HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members
descAzoriusErc721Gov: Best for adding governance capabilities to an NFT collection.
descAzoriusErc721HatsWhitelistingGov: Proposals can be created only by whitelisted Roles members
helperAllocations: Any unallocated tokens will be placed in the newly deployed DAO treasury.
helperProposers: Only these whitelisted Roles members would be able to create proposals.
helperNewToken: Create a new ERC-20 token to vote with.
helperExistingToken: Use an existing ERC-20 token contract for voting.
warningExistingToken: This token must be wrapped in order to be used as a voting token
warningExistingTokenTooltip: Decent will deploy a new ERC-20 governance token to wrap this one. Holders can deposit their tokens to vote with or withdraw them at any time.
snapshotHelper: Link a Snapshot Space via ENS to include offchain proposals and voting.
toastDisconnectedPersistent: You'll need to connect an account to deploy this Safe.
tooltipNftVoting: NFT Voting allows a group of ERC-721 (NFT) holders to propose and vote on transactions. Multiple NFT addresses can be used. <1>Learn more</1>
errorUnsupportedCreateOption: Previously selected Governance option is not supported on this network.
attachFractalModuleDescription: This setting controls whether Parent Safe will be able to execute arbitrary transactions on Child Safe bypassing voting process on Child Safe.
fractalModuleAttachedDescription: This setting can not be modified as Fractal Module already attached to the Safe.
